The misleading Facebook post included a: Hail Lord Rama #Vote4Bjp #NamoAgain," indicating a pro-BJP sentiment.
The Hindi: language writing on the photo translated to English as, "Push the lotus icon and be a contributor in the country's development," which is a reference to the BJP's logo.
The original photo: without any political slogans or scarfs, was published in an article by Indian news channel News18 Malayalam, which stated that it showed celebrity couple Deepika Padukone and Ranbeer Singh visiting Siddhivinayak Temple in Mumbai on November 20, 2018.
